    def test_delete_ticket_message_after_closure(api_client, valid_token_for_admin):
        """Негативный тест: попытка удалить сообщение после закрытия тикета"""
        payload = create_ticket_payload()
        ticket_response = api_client.post("/tickets/create", json=payload)
        ticket_id = ticket_response["id"]
    
        message_payload = create_message_payload()
        message_response = api_client.post(f"/tickets/{ticket_id}/send_message", json=message_payload)
        message_id = message_response["message"]["id"]
    
        # Закрываем тикет
        api_client.post(f"/tickets/close/{ticket_id}")
    
        # Пытаемся удалить сообщение
        delete_payload = {"message_id": message_id}
        response = api_client.post(f"/tickets/{ticket_id}/delete_message", json=delete_payload)
